alert.note: Alert for Bandera; Edwards; Gillespie; Kerr; Real (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 6:17PM CDT until May 21 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Bandera County in south central Texas... Kerr County in south central Texas... Southwestern Gillespie County in south central Texas... Central Edwards County in south central Texas... Northern Real County in south central Texas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 616 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Waltonia to 7 miles north of Vance, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kerrville, Comfort, Ingram, Hunt, Kerrville-Schreiner Park, Vance, Kerr Wildlife Management Area, Waltonia, Cypress Creek, Center Point, Mountain Home, Prade Ranch and Devil`s Sinkhole State Natural Area. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
